page.description: The LOGINLIST.A5W page shows a list of users initially configured in the security system..

section.title: Discussion
section.description: The LOGINLIST.A5W page contains the GRD_LOGINDATAGRD_INTUSERLIST Grid Component grid component, which shows a list of all users initialy listed in the security system.

section.title: Links
section.description: The Show List of Users link on the LOGIN.A5W page opens the LOGINLIST.A5W page in a popup window.

section.title: Edits to the Page Source
section.description: The page was built by opening the GRD_LOGINDATAGRD_INTUSERLIST Grid Component grid component in the grid builder and selecting "Save Page" from the toolbar. The page was then edited to Romove Non-essential Code. The only sections left on the page were Body.Search_HTML and Body.GRID_HTML, although the search section could also be removed as it isn't used.
